data.actual_result: The status icons are very small, almost only one pixel. The colour of the dot is hard to determine.
data.expected_result: The status icons are of normal size relative to the user picture. The colour is clearly visible.
data.short_description: While mentioning users the status icons are very small [iOS 9 and iPad specific]
data.steps_to_repro: - While in a text channel, press the @ key (to start mentioning a user) - Observe the status icons in the list that pops up above the message bar. (if necessary, type a few letters to bring up users)
